'; ?> Definition and Usage The output_add_rewrite_var() function adds a variable to URLs in HTML tags and hidden inputs to forms. The tags which are affected depend on the configuration of the url_rewriter.tags setting in php.ini. Syntax output_add_rewrite_var(name, value); Parameter Values Parameter Description name The name of the variable to be added to URLs and the content of the name attribute of hidden inputs in forms. value The value of the variable to be added to URLs and the content of the value attribute of hidden inputs in forms. Technical Details Return Value: TRUE on success, FALSE on failure PHP Version: 4.3+ ★ +1
